title: AptosChat - Decentralized Team Communication
description: A Web3 alternative to Slack built on Aptos! Real-time messaging with token rewards for helpful contributions and on-chain message verification.
creator: @alice_dev

title: MoodBoard - Employee Sentiment Tracker
description: Anonymous mood tracking for team wellness with NFT rewards for participation. Uses zero-knowledge proofs to ensure privacy while tracking company morale.
creator: @bob_designer

title: AptosOffice - Virtual Workspace Metaverse
description: 3D virtual office space where remote employees can meet, collaborate, and earn office tokens for participation. Built with Three.js and Aptos smart contracts.
creator: @charlie_3d

title: SkillSwap - Internal Knowledge Exchange
description: Peer-to-peer skill sharing platform where employees can teach and learn from each other, earning skill tokens and building reputation on-chain.
creator: @diana_educator

title: CarbonCredit - Company Sustainability Tracker
description: Track and gamify company carbon footprint reduction. Employees earn green tokens for eco-friendly actions and can vote on sustainability initiatives.
creator: @eve_green

title: PeerBonus - Decentralized Recognition System
description: Let employees recognize and reward each other with bonus tokens. Built-in transparency and fairness through blockchain verification.
creator: @frank_hr

title: IdeaDAO - Innovation Governance
description: Democratic idea submission and voting platform for company innovations. Stake tokens on ideas you believe in and get rewarded if they're implemented.
creator: @grace_product
